modName: Craftable_Enchantable Yngols Helm and Rueful Axe 1h 2h
summary:
NEW RELEASE - 2 user requests, 1 plugin:
- adds Yngol's Helm and Rueful Axe 2h to steel smithing
- adds Rueful Axe 1h to steel smithing

Copy meshes folder to your Skyrim|Data folder, should look like:
...Skyrimdatameshesweaponsrueful1h NIF FILES

Copy YNGOL.ESP to your SKYRIM|DATA folder, be sure that
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]

NEW RELEASE - 2 user requests, 1 plugin:
- adds Yngol's Helm and Rueful Axe 2h to steel smithing
- adds Rueful Axe 1h to steel smithing

OPTIONAL MOD: replaces vanilla 2h version with a single headed 2h axe. User request.

Copy meshes folder to your Skyrim|Data folder, should look like:
...Skyrimdatameshesweaponsrueful1h NIF FILES

Copy YNGOL.ESP to your SKYRIM|DATA folder, be sure that it is activated in the Skyrim Launcher | DATA FILES. Use the forge | steel smithing to create the items, you can enchant them now as well.

Console command to get the items:

Open the console (key ^) and enter:
HELP YNGOL 4
or
HELP RUEFUL 4

Serveral items with codes will be displayed, the items are called YNGOL'S HELM and RUEFUL AXE, RUEFUEL1H Remember the CODE to the right and enter:

PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1

(1=amount)

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
